summary: The class encapsulates a point‑spread‑function (PSF) image built from photon impact coordinates. It loads photon data from simulation files, validates positions, computes centroids, derives PSF metrics and effective collection area (given a scatter area), maintains cumulative and image representations, scans radii for encircled‑energy analysis, and visualises the distribution as a 2‑D histogram.
business_intent: Provide telescope designers and astrophysics researchers with a reusable tool to quantify and visualise the imaging performance of optical systems using simulated photon data, facilitating assessment of PSF quality and effective area.
